title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Charter Schools Are Not ‘State Actors,’ And SCOTUS Should Have Said So
items.description: Charter schools need more autonomy than district schools if American families are going to have real choice in education.

items.title: James Comey, Who Should Be In Prison, Shills On Cover-Up Queen Psaki’s Show
items.description: In a grotesquely pandering interview more flaccid than Comey’s conscience, Psaki let the weaselly old Deep Stater do what he does best: lie.

items.title: Support School Choice To Save America’s Lost Boys
items.description: An Urban Institute study reports significant benefits for male students who participated in EdChoice, Ohio’s school choice voucher program.

items.title: Trump’s Ominous Threat to Apple
items.description: The president of the United States is not a king whose words carry the power of law, yet businessmen have found it smart to act as though they do.

items.title: Rubio announces visa restrictions for foreigners 'complicit' in censoring Americans
items.description: The Trump State Department took aim at foreign authorities "complicit" in censoring Americans' free speech by imposing new visa restrictions.

items.title: Springsteen’s Quisling Concert
items.description: Borrowed politics defeat a former rock-music hero.

items.title: Trump says Canada might join states in exchange for free missile defense protection
items.description: President Trump said Canada is "considering" becoming the 51st state in exchange for free protection by the proposed "Golden Dome" defense system.

items.title: The Fortune 500 in 1972: 116 consumer products in one beautiful collage

items.title: The Left Will Never Recover from Donald Trump
items.description: Trump has shifted the Overton window in the culture away from woke, and it’s hard to imagine it shifting all the way back.

items.title: Macy’s latest earnings show the CEO’s turnaround plan is working despite a looming tariff threat

items.title: Exclusive: Stablecoin company Conduit raises $36 million from Dragonfly Capital and Altos Ventures
items.description: The company will use the money raised to expand into Asia and diversify its client base.

items.title: Douglas Murray Is Too Worried About Decorum To Say What Needs To Be Said
items.description: Whenever I read Douglas Murray, I suddenly find myself longing for the ear-splitting sound of heavy-duty steel pounding rapidly into concrete.

items.title: The Clock Is Running Out for Covid Fraud Investigations
items.description: A bill to allow more time to track down and file charges for these massive fraud schemes is languishing in the Senate.

items.title: Media Falls Over Itself To Defend South African President Who Claimed Genocidal Chants Were Free Speech
items.description: Despite the media's best attempt to cover, South Africa's president excused the genocidal chants as free speech.
